summary: OIL LIGHT BEGAN TO FLICKER ON MAINTAINED MAZDA 5. ADDED 2 QUARTS OIL. FOLLOWING DAY ENGINE BEGAN TO RATTLE , JERK AND STOP GOING 65 MPH ON FREEWAY. A ROD FROM WITHIN THE MOTOR CRACK AND PUNCTURED THE OIL PAN CRACKING THE MOTOR. A NEW MOTOR IS REQUIRED. WAS ADVISED BY INSURANCE MECHANIC SENT FOR SECOND OPINION WAS A MANUFACTURE DEFECT. MAZDA SAYS IS NOT COVER BY WARRANTY BECAUSE OF  MILEAGE ON CAR. *TR
